name: FollowingHim
0:
”Alexa Open Following Him.”
”Tell me about Following Him.”
”Goto mile ten.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: following him
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Walking in the footsteps of Jesus, sounds a bit overwhelming, both literally and figuratively. Now, figuratively, you can walk in the footsteps of Jesus by reading the Gospels, meditating on them and then adjusting your life for the better. This Alexa skill takes you through a 3700 mile journey. For each 5 mile segment, this apps tells you a part of the Gospel, in our best effort of a chronological order. Then walk, or run, for 5 miles. Use this Alexa Skill as a work-out companion, as you walk and Follow Him.
You can learn more by visiting the Following Him blog page, available at http://www.trirad.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
